title: 467. Is the Future of Farming in the Ocean?
description: Bren Smith, who grew up fishing and fighting, is now part of a movement that seeks to feed the planet while putting less environmental stress on it. He makes his argument in a book called Eat Like a Fish; his secret ingredient: kelp. But don’t worry, you won’t have to eat it (not much, at least). An installment of The Freakonomics Radio Book Club.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
